statsemdistance
Class Distances

java.lang.Object
  statsemdistance.Distances

public class Distances
extends java.lang.Object

Class "Distances" that uses the flickr database or a *.cvs file to deliver a distance matrix for existing tags based on their cooccurrence in the images.

Author:
Patrick Sebastian John von Freyend

Method Detail

calculateCooccurrences

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> calculateCooccurrences(java.lang.String term,
                                                                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> representativeTags,
                                                                            java.util.Map imagesTags)
Creates a histogramm in counting, how often a term is used in the same photo in imagesTags with each of the frequent terms (For a histogramm, take both the array frequent terms and the array with the count)

Parameters:
term - Term for which the histogramm is supposed to be calculated
representativeTags - Most frequent terms as calculcated by (String values) @getRepresentativeTags
imagesTags - Map with the images and their corresponding tags (string => string list)
Returns:
ArrayList

calculcateDistanceMatrix

public static double[][] calculcateDistanceMatrix(java.util.Map imagesTags,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> representativeTags)
Calculates a distance matrix for each tag in imagesTags and its representative tags (with the help of the Janson-Shanon-Divergence). It then writes this matrix in a *.csv-file located in the main folder.

Parameters:
imagesTags -
representativeTags -
Returns:
double[][]

cooccurrenceBetweenTerms

public static int cooccurrenceBetweenTerms(java.lang.String term,
                                           java.lang.String term2,
                                           java.util.Map imagesTags)
Counts the coocurrence of term1 and term2 in imagesTags

Parameters:
term -
term2 -
imagesTags - Map with the images and their corresponding tags (string => string list)
Returns:
int

countOccurrences

public static java.util.Map countOccurrences(java.util.Map imagesTags)
Creates a tagpool and counts all the occurrences of each tag in imagesTags (map (string => string list))

Parameters:
imagesTags - Map with all the images and their corresponding tags
Returns:
void

createTagPool

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> createTagPool(java.util.Map imagesTags)
Creates a tag pool (map with String (tag) => int) with all the different tags that exist in a map

Parameters:
imagesTags - Map with all the images and their corresponding tags
Returns:
void

divergenceOfHistogrammes

public static double divergenceOfHistogrammes(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> histogramm1,
                                              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> histogramm2,
                                              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> representativeTags)
Calculates the divergence of two histogramms created by calculateCooccurences according to the Jenson-Shanon Divergence.

Parameters:
histogramm1 -
histogramm2 -
representativeTags -
Returns:
double

getRepresentativeTags

public static java.util.ArrayList getRepresentativeTags(java.util.Map imagesTags,
                                                        int percentage)
This functions returns, given a minimum reference count of at least MIN_REFERENCE_TAG_COUNT but of a percentage of REFERENCE_TAG_PERCENTAGE (can be set above) if higher, the set of representative tags as an array list from a map with the imageid => tags (string => string list)

Parameters:
imagesTags - Map with all the images and their corresponding tags
percentage - Minimum percentage, to set in REFERENCE_TAG_PERCENTAGE
Returns:
ArrayList

imageTagsFromFile

public static java.util.Map imageTagsFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
Creates a map vom the information giving in a *.cvs file located in the /res folder (string => string list), using the first cell of a row as identifier. If a file can't be read, make sure that you are using the right path.

Parameters:
fileName - Input path for *.cvs file
Returns:
Map

mapFromDatabase

public static java.util.Map mapFromDatabase(java.lang.String url,
                                            java.lang.String user,
                                            java.lang.String password)
Establishes a database connection (to a postgres database) and saves all image ids and their corresponding tags to a map (string => string list). Please add an appropriate postgresql-driver that corresponds to your version of the JVM to the build path.

Parameters:
url - URL to the database
user - Username for the database
password - Password for the database
Returns:
void

printDistanceMatrix

public static void printDistanceMatrix(double[][] theMatrix)
Prints a distance matrix calculated by the calculate distance calculcateDistanceMatrix function.

Parameters:
theMatrix - A matrix returned by calculcateDistanceMatrix

printMap

public static void printMap(java.util.Map map)
Prints the contents of a map to the console.

Parameters:
map - URL to the database

writeDistanceMatrixIntoFile

public static int writeDistanceMatrixIntoFile(double[][] theMatrix)
Writes a distance matrix calculated by calculcateDistanceMatrix into a file named "distances.cvs" in the *.cvs-format.

Parameters:
theMatrix - A matrix returned by calculcateDistanceMatrix
Returns:
int
